sentences.sContent: We stood there crying and hugging each other.
sentences.sCn: 我们站在那里哭着互相拥抱。

sentences.sContent: She went to her daughter and hugged her tightly .
sentences.sCn: 她走到女儿身边，紧紧地拥抱她。

sentences.sContent: Nesta greeted the visitors with hugs and kisses.
sentences.sCn: 内丝塔和客人拥抱、亲吻，迎接他们的到来。

synos.tran: 拥抱；紧抱在一起；挤在一起

phrases.pCn: 粗鲁或紧紧得拥抱；[摔跤]熊抱；[金融]接管策略

words.tran: 拥抱；紧紧搂抱（hug的现在分词）

trans.tranOther: to put your arms around someone and hold them tightly to show love or friendship
the action of putting your arms around someone and holding them tightly to show love or friendship
